type.description: The type of identity used for the virtual machine.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the Virtual Machine. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

allowance.title: Allowance

plan.description: Plan to use for Store purchase

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Fusion Groups list.

virtualNetworkId.description: Resource ID of virtual network to attach the VMs to

subnet.description: Resource ID of Subnet to connect VMs to

values.description: Small fusion server, typical for replication/migration less than 1TB.

Large fusion server, typical for replication/migration larger than 500TB

storageAccountId.description: Resource ID of ADLS Gen 2 account to replicate to

storageManagedIdentity.description: Managed identity of storage account (use either key or identity)

storageAccessKey.description: Access Key for storage (use either key or identity)

nodeCount.description: The number of nodes in the zone

nodes.description: List of NodeDetails for each node in the zone

NodeDetails.description: Details of a node in the zone

fusion.description: Details of the fusion server node.

nodeName.description: The name of the Fusion node

status.description: The status of the node (Up/Down) or Unknown if the node is not responding

AzureNodeDetails.title: AzureNodeDetails
AzureNodeDetails.description: Details of a node in an azure zone

vm.description: The VirtualMachine resource associated with this node

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Plugin list.

LiveHiveHdiFusionClient.description: Live Hive Attachment to HDI Cluster

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Azure zones list.

details.description: An array indicating what errors, if any, occurred and what to do to resolve them

deploymentType.description: The deployment type of the Managed OnPrem zone

externalIp.description: The external IP of the managed OnPrem fusion server

downloadLocation.description: The location for downloading deployment files

nodes.title: NodeDetailsList
nodes.description: List of NodeDetails for each node in the zone

PathMapping.description: Replication Rule Mapping of a specific Zone

path.description: The Filesystem Path for which the zone defined by \'zone\' should replicate incoming Fusion requests to.

ManagedOnPremZoneList.description: The list of Managed OnPrem Zones.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of managed onPrem zones list.

plan.description: Plan to use for Store purchase

deploymentType.description: The type of install required for the migrator

downloadLocation.description: The location for downloading deployment files

kerberos.title: KerberosConfiguration
kerberos.description: The configuration properties for authenticating to the source filesystem

allowance.title: Allowance
allowance.description: The remaining allowance for the company associated with the Migrator

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of migrator targets list.

storageAccountId.description: Resource ID of ADLS Gen 2 account to replicate to

path.description: The Filesystem Path to be used if a PathMapping is not defined for a certain zone.

priorityZone.description: The Zone that takes precedence for a quorum in a scenario where there is an even number of zones and an equivalent amount of nodes are down in each zone

pathMapping.title: PathMapping
pathMapping.description: Path Mapping for a Replication Rule

migration.title: Migration
migration.description: The most recent migration for the replication rule

recentConsistencyReport.description: A report of the most recent consistency check completed for this path

zoneNames.description: The list of zones the replication rule applies to.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Replication Rules list.

type.description: The type of check, blocking will prevent client requests while running

nonBlockingThreshold.description: The threshold of dirty files which will cancel a non-blocking consistency check should it be met

result.description: The result of the most recent consistency check available for this path

lastCheck.description: The timestamp from when this consistency check was completed

inconsistencyCount.description: The number of inconsistent files if the result of the consistency check is inconsistent

running.description: The number of database where consistency check status is RUNNING

consistent.description: The number of database where consistency check status is CONSISTENT

inconsistent.description: The number of database where consistency check status is INCONSISTENT

failed.description: The number of database where consistency check status is FAILED

unknown.description: The number of database where consistency check status is UNKNOWN

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Resource Provider operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Resource Provider operations supported by the Resource Provider resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

code.description: An invariant error code used for error troubleshooting, aggregation, and analysis.

message.description: An actionable error message indicating what error occurred.

resourceId.description: ResourceId to which this operation applied

error.description: If present, details of the error.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Migrations list.

source.description: The source zone for replication rule

target.description: The target zone for replication rule

dateAfterWhichToMigrate.description: Date after which migration should occur. Required if overwritePolicy is SkipIfDateIsEarlier.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Migrator Migrations list.

path.description: Migration path on the source file system

targetId.description: ID of the target file system

exclusions.description: List of ids referring to exclusions to be applied to the migration

targetActionPolicy.description: The policy to use when replacing files on the target

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

Allowance.description: The remaining allowance included as part of any plan for a resource

name.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

publisher.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

product.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

promotionCode.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

version.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.

HiveReplicationRuleProperties.description: Properties of Created Hive Rule Name

dbNamePattern.description: The simple pattern of the Database as a mapped path determined by Fusion.

tableNamePattern.description: The simple pattern of the Table Name as a mapped path as determined by Fusion.

recentConsistencyReport.description: A report of the most recent consistency check completed for this rule

HiveReplicationRulesList.description: The list of Hive Replications Rules.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Hive Replication Rules list.

value.description: The list of hive replication rules

KerberosConfiguration.description: The configuration properties for authenticating using Kerberos

enabled.description: The client will use kerberos authentication if enabled is true

principal.description: The principal the client should use

keytabLocation.description: The location of the keytab file for the client to use
